title: S  o  c  i  a  l, Swift Justice 3.24.20
itunes:title: S  o  c  i  a  l, Swift Justice 3.24.20
description:
In episode 593, Jack and Miles are joined by frequent quarantine podcast guest Jamie Loftus to discuss Harvey Weinstein contracting coronavirus, people continuing to congregate regardless of warning, how Trump's original response ruined it for everyone, the Senate coronavirus bill, Tiger King on Netflix, a wonderful thread on Twitter about Ellen DeGeneres, Taylor Swift and Kanye West's forever feud, Rita Wilson rapping, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Harvey Weinstein Has Tested Positive For The Coronavirus
  2. JOSHUA TREE PARK BESIEGED BY OUT-OF-TOWNERS ... Local Neighbors Pissed
  3. Trump amid COVID-19 pandemic: With great power comes great irresponsibility.
  4. Democrats again block key vote on $2 trillion coronavirus bill as Senate floor erupts with partisan anger
  5. The coronavirus outbreak is exposing the devastating gaps between the rich and poor at a moment when America is primed for class warfare
  6. Who is Carole Baskin, Big-Cat Sanctuary Founder at Center of Netflix Docuseries Tiger King?
  7. Right now we all need a little kindness. You know, like Ellen Degeneres always talks about! She’s also notoriously one of the meanest people alive. Respond to this with the most insane stories you’ve heard about Ellen being mean & I’ll match every one w/ $2 to @LAFoodBank 
  8. Taylor Swift and Kanye West's 'Famous' Phone Call Video Leaks Online — Read the Transcript
  9. Rita Wilson rapping in quarantine is beyond impressive
  10. WATCH: Nomo - Nu Tones

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
